description: Fired when a zoom action occurs on the anatomy visualization. Provides zoom factor, position coordinates, and delta information for viewport adjustments.

payloadSchema.description: Defines the structure for the 'anatomy:interaction_zoom' event payload.

zoomFactor.description: The zoom factor to apply to the visualization.

x.description: The x-coordinate of the zoom center point.

y.description: The y-coordinate of the zoom center point.

deltaY.description: The deltaY value from the original wheel event that triggered the zoom.
